title: IMPROVE your raised bed soil the EASY Way! (With cover crops)

tasks.task: Raised Bed Garden Maintenance and Planting
subtasks: Broadcasting cover crop seeds (peas and oats)
Crimping down the terminated cover crop
Using UV treated tarps to kill the cover crop
Removing the tarps after the designated time period
Preparing the soil by adding compost
Planting zucchini and marigold plants in the prepared beds

tasks.task: Raised Bed Garden Maintenance and Planting
